urls.title: SpiceJet - Flight Booking for Domestic and International, Cheap Air Tickets
urls.description: SpiceJet, India’s favorite domestic airline, cheap air tickets flight booking to 46 cities across India and international destinations. Experience low cost air travel with the best in-class comfort, fares and baggage allowance.

data.text: @PandeyTrupti You're welcome!
@PandeyTrupti Hi Trupti, you may carry utensils in your check-in baggage only.

@AnuragSinghIM Hi Anurag, your flight is affected due to operational reasons. We always try our best to maintain departures as per schedule. However, at times, due to unavoidable reasons, we face delays. Please contact our airport staff for any assistance.

@SheleshPandey2 Hi Shelesh, kindly note that SpiceJet follows a dynamic pricing structure whereby the fares vary as per the seat availability per flight. We only have a certain number of seats available for a specific price, and once those are purchased, the next available fare is released.
@_beingalok Hi Alok, you may carry dry sweets in hand or check-in baggage. However, please note, anything which may cause spillage is not permitted.
@sitharthasg Hi Sithartha, we've received your DM, shall follow up there.

@bharath_drs Hi Bharath, please DM us the PNR so we may look into it.  Further, you may refer to point 63 here https://t.co/LIZocIBeJt for detailed information. 

https://t.co/UMdB9m2v7X

urls.description: The carriage of a passenger on SpiceJet Airlines is subject to SpiceJet regulations relating to conditions of Non-International Carriage framed in accordance with The Carriage by Air Act, 1972 and Notification regarding application of the Carriage

We had the honour of being a part of the #USISPF delegation which was graced by Honourable Chief Minister of #UttarPradesh, #Yogi Adityanath. We are extremely proud to have flown top Indian and US-based CEOs on our charter flight to #Lucknow.

#FlySpiceJet #SpiceJet #Blessed https://t.co/4mI0AL54yY

@mittalanant07 Hi Anant, please note, a passenger is allowed to carry one hand baggage of 7kg and one piece of check-in baggage up to 25kg under student fare booking. In case of excess baggage or an extra bag, charges are applicable as per policy.

@SumitKu69075734 Hi Sumit, please note that the flight is delayed due to operational reasons and the estimated departure time is 1220 hours from Delhi.

@ArshidSheikh9 Hi Arshid, currently, we are not operating for the mentioned route. Please note, we're rapidly expanding our network. We shall definitely look into the potential the option holds. Stay tuned with us for updates.

urls.title: SpiceJet
urls.description: Our employees are trained to assist our differently-abled passengers and for any sorts of limitations, we offer a wide variety of special assistance. You can obtain information in advance regarding the assistance we offer, either through this website or by contacting our Reservations on +91-124-4983410 / +91-124-7101600. Please be aware that there might be unpredictable circumstances such as weather or mechanical problems that may call for a last minute unavoidable change, but we will do our best to
